ghost

Class Fruit

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.Fruit

  • public class Fruit
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents Fruit object within the system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fruit(processing.core.PImage fruit, processing.core.PImage superFruit, Config config)
      Constructs a new Fruit object.

      It is the draw method which is called sixty (frame rate) times per second.
      void frightenedModeStart()
      This function starts the frightened mode of ghost.
      boolean getEaten()
      Returns the boolean value telling whenther the fruit has been eaten or not.
      long getFrightenedStartTime()
      Returns the time at which the last frightened mode of ghost started.

      Returns the array list of the x-axis position, followed by y-axis position of fruits on map.

      Returns the array list of the x-axis position, followed by y-axis position of super fruits on map.
      boolean hasWon()
      It returns true if the player has won, that is there are no fruits, and super fruits left to be eaten by the player.

      It removes the fruits, or super fruits with the x, and y position from the list.

      Sets the parameter as the time at which the frightened mode of ghost starts, that is the time when a super fruit was eaten.

      Sets the parameter as the list that stores the x-axis position, followed by y-axis position of fruits on map.

      Sets the parameter as the list that stores the x-axis position, followed by y-axis position of super fruits on map.

      It is called sixty (frame rate) times per second.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Fruit

        public Fruit(processing.core.PImage fruit,
             processing.core.PImage superFruit,
             Config config)
        Constructs a new Fruit object.
        Parameters:
        fruit - PImage of fruit.
        superFruit - PImage of superFruit.
        config - Object of type Config.

    • Method Detail

      • getEaten

        public boolean getEaten()
        Returns the boolean value telling whenther the fruit has been eaten or not.
        Returns:
        Outcome of whether fruit has been eaten or not.

      • getFrightenedStartTime

        public long getFrightenedStartTime()
        Returns the time at which the last frightened mode of ghost started. It returns 0 if no frightened mode has been started yet.
        Returns:
        Frightened mode start time.

      • getFruits

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getFruits()
        Returns the array list of the x-axis position, followed by y-axis position of fruits on map.
        Returns:
        Positions of fruits.

      • getSuperFruits

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getSuperFruits()
        Returns the array list of the x-axis position, followed by y-axis position of super fruits on map.
        Returns:
        Positions of super fruits.

      • setFruits

        public void setFruits(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> fruit)
        Sets the parameter as the list that stores the x-axis position, followed by y-axis position of fruits on map.
        Parameters:
        fruit - Positions of fruit.

      • setSuperFruits

        public void setSuperFruits(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> superFruit)
        Sets the parameter as the list that stores the x-axis position, followed by y-axis position of super fruits on map.
        Parameters:
        superFruit - Positions of super fruits.

      • setFrightenedStartTime

        public void setFrightenedStartTime(long time)
        Sets the parameter as the time at which the frightened mode of ghost starts, that is the time when a super fruit was eaten.
        Parameters:
        time - Frightened mode start time.

      • frightenedModeStart

        public void frightenedModeStart()
        This function starts the frightened mode of ghost. It sets the start time of frightened mode based on the time when it is called.

      • hasWon

        public boolean hasWon()
        It returns true if the player has won, that is there are no fruits, and super fruits left to be eaten by the player. It returns false if some fruits, or super fruits are still left.
        Returns:
        The win status of the game.

      • removeFruits

        public void removeFruits(int x,
                         int y,
                         java.lang.String type)
        It removes the fruits, or super fruits with the x, and y position from the list. If the type is "super" then it removes it from super fruits list, if present. If it is "simple" then it removes them from the normal fruits list, if present.
        Parameters:
        x - x-axis position of fruit
        y - y-axis position of fruit
        type - Type of fruit - simple or super.

      • tick

        public void tick()
        It is called sixty (frame rate) times per second. It performs all the necessary calculations for Fruit objects.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        It is the draw method which is called sixty (frame rate) times per second. It draws the image of fruits, and super fruits on the screen.
        Parameters:
        app - PApplet app object.
